PlanetCoasterXML

Class PlanetCoasterWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlanetCoasterXML.PlanetCoasterWriter

  • public class PlanetCoasterWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is made of static methods because it does not need to have any field
    Every method is useful to to write a list to a file or to prepare an output (for example preparing the xml code).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlanetCoasterWriter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.w3c.dom.Document generate_xml_output(PlanetCoasterReader input_final_file)
      This function generate the xml Document from the reader
      It's used to prepare the xml output after the merge
      static void write_byte_array_to_file(java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> input_array, java.lang.String fileName)
      This method write an ArrayList to a file, the file will have as name fileName
      This is used mainly to write a file with the values of a Reader, for example the comments
      static void write_multimap_to_file(com.google.common.collect.LinkedListMultimap<java.lang.String,byte[]> multimap, java.lang.String fileName)
      This method write a LinkedListMultimap to a file, it use the other write_multimap_to_file with 3 parameters
      static void write_multimap_to_file(com.google.common.collect.LinkedListMultimap<java.lang.String,byte[]> multimap, java.lang.String fileName, java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> keys_to_avoid, boolean avoid_only_full_string)
      This method write a LinkedListMultimap to a file, using format "Key - Value" for each line
      There is also a keys_to_avoid array, if the user want to not write some keys (used to not write comments for example)
      static void write_string_array_to_file(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input_array, java.lang.String fileName)
      This method write an ArrayList to a file, the file will have as name fileName
      This is used mainly to write a file with the duplicate keys found using PlanetCoasterDuplicates
      static void write_xml_file(org.w3c.dom.Document xml_document, java.lang.String output_file_name)
      This method write the XML document to an XML file

    • Method Detail

      • generate_xml_output

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document generate_xml_output(PlanetCoasterReader input_final_file)
                                                throws PlanetCoasterWriterException
        This function generate the xml Document from the reader
        It's used to prepare the xml output after the merge
        Parameters:
        input_final_file - The reader to use to generate the XML Document
        Returns:
        A XML Document, created from the input Reader
        Throws:
        PlanetCoasterWriterException - Exception thrown if an error occur reading the new document

      • write_xml_file

        public static void write_xml_file(org.w3c.dom.Document xml_document,
                                  java.lang.String output_file_name)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method write the XML document to an XML file
        Parameters:
        xml_document - the xml document to write
        output_file_name - the output file name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occur during the creation of the file

      • write_string_array_to_file

        public static void write_string_array_to_file(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input_array,
                                              java.lang.String fileName)
                                       throws PlanetCoasterWriterException
        This method write an ArrayList to a file, the file will have as name fileName
        This is used mainly to write a file with the duplicate keys found using PlanetCoasterDuplicates
        Parameters:
        input_array - The ArrayList with the values to write in the file
        fileName - The name of the file to create
        Throws:
        PlanetCoasterWriterException - Exception thrown if an error occur while writing the file (java.io.IOException)

      • write_byte_array_to_file

        public static void write_byte_array_to_file(java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> input_array,
                                            java.lang.String fileName)
                                     throws PlanetCoasterWriterException
        This method write an ArrayList to a file, the file will have as name fileName
        This is used mainly to write a file with the values of a Reader, for example the comments
        Parameters:
        input_array - The ArrayList with the values to write in the file (converting them to string)
        fileName - The name of the file to create
        Throws:
        PlanetCoasterWriterException - Exception thrown if an error occur while writing the file (java.io.IOException)

      • write_multimap_to_file

        public static void write_multimap_to_file(com.google.common.collect.LinkedListMultimap<java.lang.String,byte[]> multimap,
                                          java.lang.String fileName)
                                   throws PlanetCoasterWriterException
        This method write a LinkedListMultimap to a file, it use the other write_multimap_to_file with 3 parameters
        Parameters:
        multimap - The multimap to write in the file
        fileName - The name of the file to create
        Throws:
        PlanetCoasterWriterException - Exception thrown if an error occur while writing the file (java.io.IOException)

      • write_multimap_to_file

        public static void write_multimap_to_file(com.google.common.collect.LinkedListMultimap<java.lang.String,byte[]> multimap,
                                          java.lang.String fileName,
                                          java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> keys_to_avoid,
                                          boolean avoid_only_full_string)
                                   throws PlanetCoasterWriterException
        This method write a LinkedListMultimap to a file, using format "Key - Value" for each line
        There is also a keys_to_avoid array, if the user want to not write some keys (used to not write comments for example)
        Parameters:
        multimap - The multimap to write in the file
        fileName - The name of the file to create
        keys_to_avoid - Array of the keys to skip while writing
        avoid_only_full_string - (True and False are described below) if avoid_only_full_string is True = the key in keys_to_avoid must be equal to multimap key if avoid_only_full_string is False = the key in keys_to_avoid could be equal or could contain the multimap key
        Throws:
        PlanetCoasterWriterException - Exception thrown if an error occur while writing the file (java.io.IOException)
